long_description: Our Novara Arkham bike is an easy-riding city bike that sports comfortable geometry and a no-fuss carbon belt drive. With a rear rack and fenders you're set for errands and short commutes. Gates CDC carbon belt system is quiet and long-wearing without the noise or grease of a traditional chain. SRAM iMotion 3-speed internal gears are low-maintenance compared to conventional cassette systems and are simple to shift. Aluminum frame is lightweight and strong, and chromoly fork delivers plenty of strength to roll over potholes and navigate through uneven city streets. Mechanical disc brakes provide sure, quick stops. Puncture-resistant Schwalbe Marathon tires feature sure grip and a fast, smooth ride. Rear bike rack is ready for cargo, quickly accepting panniers or trunk bag (not included)-great for carrying groceries or work essentials. Head tube features Novara "N Dock" mounting braze-ons to attach an aftermarket Barrow basket (sold separately). Alloy chainguard and full-coverage alloy fenders keep you and your clothes protected; kickstand makes parking easy and the included bell lets you alert others to your presence. Just get on and ride, no fancy shoes required-platform pedals accommodate a variety of shoes. Specs on our Novara Arkham bike are subject to change.
